sense.name: feel about uncertainly or blindly
sense.examples: She groped for her classes in the darkness of the bedroom. I had to grope around in the darkness for the light switch. John groped along the wall to find the door.

sense.name: search blindly or uncertainly
sense.examples: His mind groped to make the connection. He seemed to be groping for an answer to the question. Frank groped to understand the explanation.

sense.name: fondle for sexual pleasure
sense.examples: He made some sexual comments and groped her repeatedly. The lovers groped each other in the dark theater. Sam groped his secretary and was subsequently fired.
